name: Aura A
description:
| PITCH

Aura is a cooperative online puzzle with procedural architecture.

| INSTRUCTIONS

_ Install Aura on two PCs
_ Have Steam running on both PCs
_ You have to be in the friendslist of eachother
_ The first player klicks on [Play]
_ The second player klicks on [Find Game]

| CONTROLS

[WASD]   move
[QERF]   select zools
[N]   skip to next level
[Esc]   quit game
